alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 10:21PM EDT until April 19 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. The higher totals will be at elevations of a 1000 feet or greater. * WHERE...Western Schenectady, Montgomery, Southern Fulton and Southeast Warren Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may briefly reach close to an inch per hour late tonight. There could be a light glaze of freezing rain late tonight into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Montgomery; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Western Schenectady
